description: Generate a structured creative writing outline that breaks down a work into detailed sections with specific guidelines for content generation. Supports various formats including novel chapters, essays, scripts, and other creative works.

input_variables.name: objective
input_variables.description: The type and scope of the creative work (e.g., 'Write Chapter 3 of a science fiction novel', 'Create outline for historical essay', 'Design act structure for comedy play')

input_variables.name: context
input_variables.description: Background information about the creative work, including setting, previous events, established characters, themes, or research context that influences the outline

input_variables.name: output_format
input_variables.description: The structural format for the outline (e.g., 'JSON with sequential scenes', 'hierarchical chapter breakdown', 'scene-by-scene script outline')

input_variables.name: stipulations
input_variables.description: Style guidelines, tone requirements, and specific elements that must be included in the outline (e.g., 'maintain suspense', 'include academic citations', 'focus on character development')
